comment: Kopec variation which i am not familiar with.

moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 e6 3. Bd3 Nc6 4. c3 Nf6 5. Bc2 d5
comment:
...Ng4 not good because of doubled h pawns after Qd4
& ...f6 dubious, allowing scope for WBs.

moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 e6 3. Bd3 Nc6 4. c3 Nf6 5. Bc2 d5 6. e5 Nd7 7. d4 cxd4 8. cxd4 Be7 9. Nc3 a6 10. Be3 Nb6 11. Nd2 h5
comment:
I felt it was the only move to prevent WQ going
to g4 or h5. It meant BQ side castling likely.

Room for King. I was concerned about Na4 or a4 for W and the sacrifice of the
WB at a6.
